summary:
Adds a 1 handed version of the bloodskal blade to the game.
It's a bit shorter so that it matches the sword size.
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a 1 handed version of the bloodskal blade to the game.
It's a bit shorter so that it matches the sword size.
[size=4][u][b]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC.[/b][/u][/size]

The weapon has no enchantment because i couldn't make it work (any help appreciated).
I would really appreciate it if someone could model and texture a scabbard.

The weapon can be smithed usind 3 silver ingots and 2 leather strips.
Tempering requires 1 silver ingot.

If you have any retextures of the original weapon, they will be applied to this weapon as well.

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
